kitchensink.name: Kitchen Sink
kitchensink.description: The kitchen sink is the first Codename One demo. It was rewritten in 2016 as part of a general overhaul. You can check out the full app in Google Play, itunes as well as live on the Codename One website thanks to the JavaScript port of Codename One.

pheonix.name: Pheonix UI
pheonix.description: Port of the PhoenixUI kit PSD by Adrian Chiran to Codename One.

cleanmodernui.name: Clean Modern UI
cleanmodernui.description: This is a port of the Clean Modern PSD to Codename One which allows it to run on all devices. You can see this running in the browser and on device by checking out the demos page.

pheonix2.name: Pheonix UI
pheonix2.description: Port of the PhoenixUI kit PSD by Adrian Chiran to Codename One.
